descriptionHtml:
i made this esp file for shigglebigglebahs Lollipop adds it to the forge in ebony
as its own weapon and it can be uped at the grindstone i seen in the description
that shigglebigglebah wonted it as a non-replacer so i pm shigglebigglebah and asked
if they wonted me to make a non-replacer so here it is...

just open the lollipop.rar to your skyrim folder and make sure the esp is on



i did not make the meshes or textures all i did was the FOMM+TESship work

Credits = shigglebigglebah for the meshes and textures


here\'s the Lollipop Axe by shigglebigglebah >>

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4625
author: xvom
